alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:11PM CST until March 05 at 8:45PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clayton County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Grant County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 810 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lancaster to near Bernard, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lancaster around 815 PM CST. Dubuque around 820 PM CST. Hazel Green and Dickeyville around 840 PM CST. Cuba City around 845 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Kieler, Lock And Dam 11, Big H Campground, Sandy Hook, Arthur, Potosi and North Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
